title: TourMate
description: A travel planning web app to help users find and book tours, view detailed itineraries, and get personalized recommendations.
features: Search and filter tours by location and date
Interactive maps with Google Maps integration
challenges: Integrating Google Maps API with custom markers and routes.
Implementing a robust booking system with real-time updates.
Ensuring mobile responsiveness across multiple devices.
futurePlans: Develop a mobile app version using React Native.

title: Recipe App
description: A full-stack recipe management app to browse, add, update and delete recipes with user authentication.
features: REST API backend with Node.js and Express
challenges: Handling image uploads without a third-party service.

title: Doctor Booking App
description: A full-stack web application where patients can browse doctors by specialty, check availability, and book appointments in real-time.
features: User registration and login with Firebase Authentication
Doctor listing with filtering by specialty and location
Real-time booking system with date and time selection
Admin panel to manage doctors, bookings, and users
challenges: Designing a real-time booking system with availability checks
Managing time slots dynamically across different doctors
Handling user roles (admin, patient, doctor) with proper access control
futurePlans: Integrate video consultation (Zoom API or Jitsi)
Add payment gateway for premium bookings
Implement prescription sharing and appointment history
